mapper.data:
Your monthly update of Open Research events
Hi there 👋
Here is your monthly automated newsletter. Do you want a free Open Research Calendar sticker? Request one here.

Check out the events coming up in the next two months that have been submitted to the calendar.

{{formatDate(now; "MMMM")}}

    {{35.text}}

{{formatDate(addMonths(now; 1); "MMMM")}}

    {{47.text}}
Got feedback on this email? Use GitHub Discussions or Issues.
Have we missed anything?
Add Event
View the Calendar
Something look wrong? Report event here

You have received this email as you subscribed to the Open Research Calendar newsletter. If you no longer wish to receive these, click below.

Unsubscribe
